content: Round 1 END(07/11/2023): Â ğŸ“£ğŸ“£Good day to all hunters, as you begin your third (06/11-12/11) week of work, And notice the attachments below.ğŸ“ŒYou should review how to buy a token on an exchange on social media.ğŸ“ŒWe need to make more videos on how and where to buy a token.ğŸ“ŒAnd as mandatory, official website link and Dex Trade link should be used in every promotion.ğŸš¨Remember: Without these your works will not be considered correct.We are in regular conversation with the project owner,, your work needs further improvement.Good luck to you all, thanks for being with us.â›¤WEBSITEâ›¤ TWITTERâ›¤TELEGRAMâ›¤ TELEGRAM CHANNEL â›¤ PROJECT ROADMAPâ›¤ MEDIUMâ›¤ WHITPAPERâ›¤______________________________________________________Smart People please trade here Dex Trade Â ğŸ”¸10000 $USDT  tokens are to be divided according to the stakes accumulated amongst selected participants.ğŸ”¸The bounty program was launched on 18 October 2023 ğŸ”¸Tokens will be distributed to participants the end of the Bounty Campaign ( Distribution granted by bounty manager )ğŸ”¸All participants must join Trust M.C 100 Telegram Group, Telegram ChannelAnd Join Bank11.io  Telegram Group Twitter PageğŸ”¸ Please ask your bounty-related questions in the  Trust M.C 100 .ğŸ”¸KYC is not required for the bounty campaign. However, the project's team has the right to require KYC for suspicious cases.ğŸ”¸Using multiple accounts, cheating and spamming are not allowed. ğŸ”¸Participants with a minimum of 30+ activity counts on Bitcointalk will be eligible to join the campaignsğŸ”¸Negative Trusted Accounts not allow.ğŸ”¸All participants must send the Proof of Authentication post to join the bounty program.Twitter fast Â  Â 400Telegram Â  Â  Â  Â 350Reddit Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â 200TikTok or YouTube Â 150Article top Â  Â  Â 150_______________Twitter Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  35%Telegram Â  Â  Â  15%Reddit Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  15%Â Article Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â 10%TikTok or YouTube Â  Â  Â 15% Â  Â Reserve Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  10%Note:  Due to the bounty duration and pool, we have limited the number of participants for this bounty.Please submit your weekly report on this bounty thread Week: 1 (18/10-24/10) endWeek: 2 (28/10-03/11)endWeek: 3 (06/11-12/11)endWeek: 4 (13/11-19/11)endNext update ( end of the 5th week )Rewards:  1. 1000 - 3000 followers: 5 stake/week2. 3001 - 5000 followers: 7 stakes/week3. 5001 - 8000 followers: 10 stakes/week4. 8001+ - followers: 14 stakes/weekRules: Â â–ªï¸Must follow Bank11.io  Twitter Page.â–ªï¸Must Join Bank11.io Telegram group .â–ªï¸ Twitter accounts must have a minimum of 1000 followers.â–ªï¸Participants have to make 5 retweet & 2 new posts per week with project link otherwise you get rewarded zero[Maximum 1 post/Day]â–ªï¸Time gap between 2 posts needs to be 12 hours minimum.â–ªï¸Participants must use $x11b #Bank11 #Xeleven #CAR #BTC #Sango #Metaverse #NFT#Binance #ETH #Ethereum hashtags & website link in every tweet & retweet.  Twitter Joining formRewards:2 stakes/par post Rules:â–ªï¸Must Join Bank11.io Telegram group .â–ªï¸Update your Telegram name Â Your Name | Bank11.io Ambassador.(Example: Trust M.C 100 | Bank11.oi Ambassador)â–ªï¸Replace your profile picture with  Bank11.io.â–ªï¸Participants can only wear one project name at a time. â–ªï¸Your telegram username must be visible to all while in the community. You must interact with the Telegram account with which you have registered the campaign. â–ªï¸Write at least 5 constructive messages in top exchangeâ€™s telegram groups & 5 message Project telegram group.â–ªï¸You must stay in the telegram group until the end of the campaign to receive your stakes.Â   Telegram Joining formRewards:1. Have more than 30 Karma: 1 stake/week2. Have more than 500 Karma: 2 stakes/week3. Have more than 3000 Karma: 3 stakes/week4. Have more than 10000 Karma: 5 stakes/weekRules:â–ªï¸Must Join Bank11.io  Telegram group .â–ªï¸Reddit account must be at least 2 month old with at least 10 posts and 30 karmas.â–ªï¸Write weekly 3 post on own profile & 2 in others crypto subreddit group. (Maximum 1 post/day)â–ªï¸Post must focus on a topic relevant to The BlockPark.â–ªï¸Participants must use $11xb #Bank11 #Xeleven #CAR #BTC #Sango #Metaverse #NFT#Binance #ETH #Ethereum hashtags & website link in every own postÂ   Reddit Joining formRewards:  1. Have more than 1000 views: 1 stake2. Have more than 2000 views: 2 stake3. Have more than 3000 views: 3 stake4. Have more than 5000 views: 5stakes5. Have more than 10,000 views: 10 stakesRules: â–ªï¸Must Join Bank11.io  Telegram group .â–ªï¸TikTok/Youtube Shorts/ Reels etc. accounts must have a minimum of 200 followers or subscribe.â–ªï¸Videos need to be unique and have at least 1000 views. â–ªï¸Videos need to be a minimum of 2 minutes in length. â–ªï¸Participant's short video contents must focus on a relevant topic about the project's features, latest project's token updates/development, etc.â–ªï¸Participants have to shoot 2 unique videos Â (maximum 1 video/week).â–ªï¸Participants must use $11xb #Bank11 #Xeleven #CAR #BTC #Sango #Metaverse #NFT#Binance #ETH #Ethereum hashtags , wallet address & website link in every video.  TikTok or YouTube Joining formReward: ğŸ”¸Good: 1ğŸ”¸Best: 2ğŸ”¸Better: 3Rules: Â â–ªï¸Must Join Bank11.io  Telegram group .Articles should be quality and unique with a minimum of 500 words. (Participants who copy the project's website, whitepaper or ANN thread, will not receive rewards)â–ªï¸Each participant can write more than 1 article, however, the articles need to be clearly different from each other and published at another website,â–ªï¸Articles should be published on blogs recommended by us: Steemit, Medium, and LinkedIn and must be publicly accessible. Other high ranked blogs may be accepted.â–ªï¸Removal/deletion will result in disqualification.â–ªï¸Published Articles must include at least 2 images of the project, link to the the Proof of Authentication, the project's ICO website, main website, Medium page,â–ªï¸Participants must use $11xb #Bank11 #Xeleven #CAR #BTC #Sango #Metaverse #NFT#Binance #ETH #Ethereum hashtags , wallet address & website link in Article.  Article Joining formAll participants have to submit their weekly reports [ Twitter, Telegram Â ] on this bounty thread. Stakes will be calculated on a weekly basis.
